citations.narrative:
Several sections of cattle panel from a recent fencing job have been left inside the enclosure by the office housing 4
Longhorns. There is risk that the animals could be injured if their horns become entangled on the loose cattle panel.
Enclosures must be kept free of loose materials and maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury and be
maintained in good repair.
CORRECT BY : 12/22/2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
Several sections of cattle panel from a recent fencing job have been left inside the enclosure by the office housing 4 
Longhorns. There is risk that the animals could be injured if their horns become entangled on the loose cattle panel. 
Enclosures must be kept free of loose materials and maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury and be 
maintained in good repair.  
CORRECT BY : 12/22/2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
